title: Annual AC Maintenance
description: Scheduled preventive maintenance for residential AC system. Check refrigerant levels, clean coils, inspect electrical connections.

title: Rooftop Unit Quarterly Inspection
description: Q4 2024 inspection - Building A RTU. Verify damper operation, check belt tension, test economizer.

title: Water Heater Leak Repair
description: Emergency service call - water pooling near water heater. Inspect T&P valve and drain valve.

title: Furnace Safety Inspection
description: Annual safety inspection before heating season. Test carbon monoxide levels, inspect heat exchanger, verify ignition system.

title: Mini-Split Filter Cleaning
description: Routine maintenance - clean filters, check drain line, verify remote operation.

title: Compressor Replacement - Building B
description: Replace failed compressor on Building B rooftop unit. Order part #YCD120-COMP-01.

title: Heat Pump Defrost Cycle Repair
description: Customer reported ice buildup. Check defrost board, inspect reversing valve, test outdoor temperature sensor.

title: Refrigerant Leak Repair
description: Low cooling performance - detected refrigerant leak at service valve. Repair leak and recharge system.

title: Commercial Water Heater Annual Flush
description: Annual maintenance - drain and flush sediment, test anode rod, verify temperature settings.

title: RTU Economizer Install
description: Upgrade Building A rooftop unit with new economizer for energy efficiency. Install and commission.
